snippet.title: Atari 2600 Longplay [019] Assault
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Yushira

Assault is one of the rare early non-arcade games to have a kill screen. After a while, the enemies will be invisible and invincible so you are stuck there till you die. Don't shoot to fast or you will overheat and die. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
